Text:
Every civilization in history that ever amounted to anything, recognized the existence of a supreme being of one form or another.
Coincidence? Me thinks nay.

Is this any good?
Interesting?
Biased?
A/V quality?

Guess I'll find out.

@TaiTheGuy But they can't all be right and many contradict each other and even themselves. Maybe the belief in a Supreme being was a sort of social evolutionary step necessary to take mankind from random, tribeless hunter gatherers to societies living in sprawling cities?

Anyways, thanks for the upload!
